long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This small extension automates clicking the little loot box in the Twitch chat. If you are not actively in the chat during a stream it can be annoying if this little green box pops up wanting to be clicked. That's why I created this extension. You can also disable the automated clicking with a simple switch within the extension panel. I'm always happy about feedback.
